description:
Grant a damaged ally +3|+3.
Shuffle a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Braum</style></link> into your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Grant a damaged ally +3|+3.
Shuffle a Braum into your deck.
flavorText: "... Though his wounds were great, Braum threw back his head and laughed. For he knew that dire times are when heroes are made!" - The Tale of Braum
name: Braum's Take Heart
